analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na magga ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na magga hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇam dhamma

original: paṭicca namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: paṭicca na magga adhipati dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca

original: namaggārammaṇo ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ
analyzed: na magga ārammaṇaḥ ca na magga adhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇa

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na magga hetukaḥ ca na magga adhipati ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na magga ārammaṇaḥ ca na magga hetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namaggārammaṇo ca namaggahetuko ca namaggādhipati
analyzed: hetu paccayā magga ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca na magga ārammaṇaḥ ca na magga hetuko ca na magga adhipati

original: Hetuyā pañcatiṁsa, ārammaṇe chabbīsa …pe… avigate pañcatiṁsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā pañcatisa ārammaṇe chabbīsa pe avigate pañcatisa sabbattha vitthāretabba
